name: Dig 'N' Dice
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A Submission for The Flair Fair Jam 2021!
Theme : The Environment is alive.

Code: AkumionBass
Art: Louie Jams
Music

｡(✿‿✿)｡  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  IDEA  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  (⊙ω⊙✿)

Grow your unique garden by rolling the dice and placing down tiles within the fences!

Experiment with the tiles to find bonuses! But be wary.. you only have a set number of turns!

╰(◡‿◡✿╰)  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  CONTROLS   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   (◠△◠✿)

Select the dice with LMB and place in the garden. If you want to deselect a chosen dice, use the RMB.

Some dice can only be used when certain tiles are made. For example: Flower seeds can only be placed on grass tiles and fish can only be placed on water tiles.

Dice:
Water = Place on a dirt tile (creates a water tile and damp dirt tiles)
Grass seed = Place on a damp dirt tile (creates a grass tile)
Flower seed = Place on a grass tile (creates a flower tile, these take 2 turns to grow)
Fish  = Place on a water tile (creates a fish tile)
